title: Sizing Up Trade Setups in Gold and the Nasdaq 100
text:
In early October the December gold futures made a key low into Fibonacci time and price parametersThe price support came in at the $1,461.20-1,467.30 areaThe actual low was made at $1,465.00 which was directly within that zoneGold daily prices View Chart » View in New Window » There was also a Fibonacci "time cluster" that was evident at that low...

description: Carolyn Boroden sizes up trade setups in gold and the Nasdaq 100 and awaits triggers for both.
authors: Sizing Up Trade Setups In Gold
